alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 6:30AM AKST until January 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Light snow has begun and will continue into the weekend across the northern panhandle. 4 to 6 inches of snow has fallen from Gustavus to Juneau by 6 am. Snowfall rates will gradually increase in intensity through the weekend as well. Snow has started dry and fluffy but may become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm through the weekend. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light dry snow will accumulate quickly through the day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
